## Voice.handleFirebaseMessage() method

Handle Firebase messages from an out-of-band Firebase messaging service.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
handleFirebaseMessage(remoteMessage: Record<string, string>): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  remoteMessage | Record&lt;string, string&gt; |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

A `Promise` that - Resolves with a boolean. This boolean is `true` if the Firebase message was handled properly, `false` otherwise. - Rejects if an error occurred when parsing the Firebase message, or if the app is incorrectly configured. This method will also reject if used on an unsupported platform.

## Remarks

Note that this method only works on Android platforms, and will only work when the built-in Firebase messaging service as been opted-out.

Unsupported platforms: - iOS
